title: Remember When: Natalia Kills and Willy Moon blew up X Factor NZ
content:encoded:
"Ladies and gentlemen, we have a doppelganger in our midst". Join Jane Yee, Alex Casey and Duncan Greive as we look back on the suit-based X Factor NZ scandal that stopped the nation in its tracks.\
